channel.title: Saving the character
channel.description:
Hi, im quite new to this..
I have my server running on my lan, but whenever i log out and log back in it doesnt save!! can someone please help? BTW. im using salibs (sp?) client.

item.title: Saving the character
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

On most server’s it doesn’t save until you’ve done something with that character to make it save. A way to do this would be to level in a skill using a dummy or hay bale. After this, log out, and then back in. It should work right.

Read full topic
